description: PEPPERMINT ESSENTIAL OIL ROLL ON - 100 % PURE

Botanical Name: Mentha Piperita. Peppermint is Native to Japan. Uses: Diffuse Peppermint essential oil into the air to help with headaches. Inhale or apply topically. Peppermint essential oil is great added to a carrier oil or lotion for massages and pedicures.

CAUTION: Do not take internally. Do not apply to or near the face of infants or children. May irritate on sensitive skins; dilute up tp 10% accordingly to prevent skin irritation. Keep away from children and avoid during pregnancy unless approved by your primary doctor. 100% Pure Grade; please dilute with carrier oil if you find it to be too strong or a skin irritant.
